thread.section_title: LightOnline Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LightOnline Australia | lightonline.com.au
thread.title: Rob Barber
thread.title_full: LightOnline Australia reviewed by Rob Barber

author: Rob Barber
title: Rob Barber
text: I was very disappointed with the service at LightOnline. I placed an order and paid for a medical bulb but found later that they had not ordered one from their supplier even after two weeks. I called them on several occasions after that to see when it would arrive but was never rung back with any information on likely delivery date. I finally asked for a refund which they did do quickly. I then placed an order from a store in Hong Kong. It was half the cost for the same product. The overseas bulb was posted the day after I ordered it. I thought dealing with a local company would be best but was very wrong on this occasion.
